embeds.title: In-game | Persistent Universe
embeds.description:
__Server related__

◉ [Are the game servers down? / How long do patches take?](https://discord.com/channels/82210263440306176/900433210314461204/902086503184883732) 

__Common In-Game issues__

◉ [Crashing after waking up / in elevator / in train / in the city / every 5 minutes or less](https://discord.com/channels/82210263440306176/900433210314461204/902086574118953000)

◉ [F2 / Starmap is empty, nothing is showing](https://discord.com/channels/82210263440306176/900433210314461204/902086613142757386)

◉ [MobiGlas is missing or non-functional / Invisible character / missing head or eyes](https://discord.com/channels/82210263440306176/900433210314461204/902086648068702238)

◉ [Error when retrieving ship / Won't repair / Spawning in the air / Missing components or seats](https://discord.com/channels/82210263440306176/900433210314461204/902086705815904276)

◉ [Trade terminal not showing ships or commodities](https://discord.com/channels/82210263440306176/900433210314461204/902086758970314813)

◉ [Ship parts spawn/raining down around you:](https://discord.com/channels/82210263440306176/900433210314461204/902086804524646470)

[**↑ __Back to Table of Contents__ ↑**](https://discord.com/channels/82210263440306176/900433210314461204/901217359241560065)

◉ [Audio cutting out or CTD caused by audio glitch](https://discord.com/channels/82210263440306176/900433210314461204/902086842952871966)
